resources.string: Calling all Android users! Want to experience the iPhoneX on your phone? Well there is an app for that! It\'s 100% free and available on Google Play. Download it today!
Follow Leonard Tatum, %s, for more cool apps!
Behold! Make your Android phone look like the iPhone X. You know you love it!
Enjoying the app? Tell your friends about it! And don\'t forget to show your appreciation by rating this app. Thank you!
If you are enjoying using this app, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
